Source.Name: fd
Source.Summary: A simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to find
Source.Description: fd is a program to find entries in your filesystem. It is a simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to find. While it does not aim to support all of find's powerful functionality, it provides sensible (opinionated) defaults for a majority of use cases.

Package.Name: fd
Package.Summary: A simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to find
